Product Description

ABOUT VIWIK

Pouring our heart into serving the global vehicle owners! VIWIK adopt professional 3D laser analysis and try every floor mat model on it’s specific car model, accurate to every corner of the car.

If you are looking for the custom fit and qualified floor mats for your car, please look here. Once you choose us, we would take all reponsibility for making you satisified with our products and answering your inquiry within 10 hours.

VIWIK Floor Mats accompany and guard your every trip with super comfort, toughness and clearness!

COMPATIBILITY

Compatible with 2017-2022 Hond-a CR-V

Compatible with 2017 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2018 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2019 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2020 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring/ Hybrid EX/ Hybrid LX/ Hybrid EX-L/ Hybrid Touring

Compatible with 2021 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2022 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

ALL-WEATHER PROTECTION

Thickened 3 layer liners are fabulously durable and won’t be out of shape or break under any circumstance. The heavy duty TPE material can well withstand heat or coldness, good at all weather protection.

WHY CHOOSE VIWIK？ Non-Toxic and Odorless TPE Material Perfect Fit through Using 3D Printing Technology All-weather Protection of Upholstery Unique Groove Design Safe and None-Skidding Easy to Clean and Maintain Preserve the Resale Value A Perfect Solution for Dog Hair

PERFECT FIT

VIWIK Floor mats are compatible with the factory retention posts to keep your floor mats securely in place. Advanced 3D laser technology offers a Precise fit to your vehicle’s floor. No cutting, no trimming.

Tips: The floor mats may curl up a little due to being folded in the carton. We recommend you lay them flat for a day before installing them on the vehicle. Then they will precisely cover your car’s floor. Thank you for your understanding.

PACKAGE INCLUDES:

2 x Front Floor Liner

1 x Rear Floor Liner

1 x Installation Manual

PREMIUM TPE MATERIAL, TOUGH & DURABLE

Premium TPE material is non-toxic, odorless and durable. The floor liners also remain flexible under extreme temperature. Any external dirt or stains can be easily cleanned up and the mats are always fresh in a long time.

UNIQUE GROOVE DESIGN

Scientific channels and ridges of the car mats can perfectly trap the liquid, scraps, mud, snow, sand etc. Rugged edges keep all mess within the mats but far away your car. Easy to clean them just by wiping or rinsing.

ANTI-SKID DESIGN

Designed for your safe driving and walking around, non-skid corner nibs offer effective retention and make sure the floor mats stay firmly with no movement. Be especially protective to children and olders.

Vehicle Specific

PRECISE FIT— VIWIK floor mats adopt 3D scanning analysis and multiple tryings with the specific car models, so there wouldn’t be any unfit problem. These car mats are custom fit for 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 Hond-a CR-V, no dead space, precisely covering your car’s floor and can be quickly putted in.
PREMIUM TPE MATERIAL— Made of 100% TPE material, these foor liners are environment-friendly, completely odorless so you can get rid of the unpleasant smell when in the car. They are born for super comfort, cleanness and very durable for use. No out of shape, stiff or break issues.
ALL WEATHER PROTECTION— Designed with rugged ridges, channels and heightened edges, the automotive floor mats can easily trap all kinds of liquid, scraps, mud, dirt, sand and snow etc, perfectly protecting your car in all weathers. Working well in extreme hot, cold or corrosive environments, the car floor mats are especially reliable.
NON-SLIP & EASY TO CLEAN— Rugged ridges are also designed for your safe driving and walking around. Non-skid corner nibs offer effective retention and make sure the floor mats stay firmly with no movement. Rest assured that childern and olders can freely walk on the floor mats. When clean the mats, just wipe with a wet cloth or take them out from the vehicle to rinse and dry.
WHAT EXTRA WE PROVIDE— Pouring our heart into serving the global vehicle owners! We accept lifetime return & replacement and welcome to ask us at any time if you have any question.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $305.00 - $215.80
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:11:49 UTC – Details)


Carhartt SeatSaver seat covers from Covercraft are the solution to the problem of keeping the seats in your truck or SUV clean and protected from daily use and weekend adventures. Made from durable, duck-weave fabric, these custom-fit seat covers protect your seats from dirt, mud, grime, spills and more. Featuring Rain Defender technology, a durable water repellency finish is added to the fabric to make it highly water resistant. Combine these features with the custom fitment and classic Carhartt styling, you get seat covers that look great and protect your seats from whatever you throw at them.
Compatible vehicle(s): 2017-2018 Chevrolet Silverado 1500, 2019 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 LD (old body style), 2017-2019 Chevrolet Silverado 2500/3500, 2017-2018 GMC Sierra 1500, 2019 GMC Sierra 1500 Limited (old body style), 2017-2019 GMC Sierra 2500/3500
Compatible seat type: 1st row 40/20/40-split bench seat, with adjustable headrests, with fold-down console/cupholder with lid, with storage under center seat, with seat airbags (headrest covers and console cover included)
Custom-patterned to fit your specific vehicle
Classic Duck-Weave Carhartt fabric for durability
Highly water-resistant; Protection from dirt, dust & spills; Machine washable
Ideal for protection from work, hunting, fishing, pets and anything else you can throw at them
Easy installation and removal

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers

Don't let the good looks fool you. These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit. Our Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are designed for heavy-duty protection for work, hunting, fishing, pets, and anything else you throw at them. Not only is the fabric super durable, but it is highly water-resistant to bead away any moisture, spills, or drool from your pups.

Read more

Variety of Seat Seat Styles and Configurations

Custom Patterned Seat Cover

Our Carhartt Seat Covers are custom-patterned for a perfect fit. Enter your Year/Make/Model details and you should see all patterns available for your vehicle.

Make Your Seats Carhartt Tough

Our Carhartt SeatSaver Seat Covers are designed to fit great while being easy on/off seat covers with the same amazing rugged durability you expect from Carhartt.

All Applicable Headrests & Armrests Included

Our Carhartt Seat Covers not only cover the entire backside of the seat on front seat covers we also have rear map pockets built-in so that you don't lose any much-needed storage space.

Read more

Authentic Carhartt Products

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers are the trusted, durable, and dependable design you know and love from Carhartt.

Pillow to Secure Cover

Each seat cover includes a pillow tab to secure the cover. No slipping, sliding or refitting this seat cover thanks to the securing pillow.

Carhartt Styling

Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are the ideal seat cover when your primary focus is a great fit and superior protection paired with a classic nod to the Carhartt clothing you have come to love.

Carhartt Triple Stitched Seams

These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:11:49 UTC - Details)

return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $46.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:54 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Giraffe Tools

Gear that works hard so you don’t have to

Giraffe Tools is the global leader in Hose & Hose Reel. Our products aim to truly benefit our consumer’s daily lives. Giraffe Tools insistence on automatic retraction technology in hose reel / pressure washer / cord reel industries has allowed the brand’s products to maintain its outstanding quality for more than decades.

Shop more garden hose

What makes our products unique?

Giraffe Tools has complete sets of modernized production facilities, much-specialized personnel and reputable designers.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team is constantly making a concerted effort to keep pushing forward in the pursuit of creating exceptional products that add value to everyday lives.

What problem are we solving?

Under our strict quality-monitoring framework, all products pass multiple inspection processes which provides consumers more safeguard.

Wide Applications: The water hose can be cut to whatever length you want. Long enough to clean roof, front and back yard, and short enough to be a lead-in hose.
NO KINK: The newest material is memoryless, the heavy duty hose will not kink, and easily coil and uncoil. The 3-layers design allows the hose to remain flexible under extreme temperatures.
Lightweight and Durable: Using the latest hybrid material from rubber and polymer, it is much lighter, more durable, and wear-resistant than the traditional rubber hose.
Special Design: The amazing part of this hose is that it can be re-used. If one part is broken, you can cut it off, and get the fittings re-connected. This one hose can be used throughout your whole lifetime. Great for garden, lawn, yard, car washing, and pets cleanings.
2-Year Limited Warranty: The Giraffe team has always been committed to improving the quality of life for everyone and enabling more families to enjoy the pleasures of the yard. All products are 2-year limited warranty for worry-free shopping.

Hybrid Garden Hose

  • All weather flexibility
  • Durable and wear resistant
  • 3/4in. brass plated fittings
  • Kink resistant
  • Lightweight
  • Easy to coil and uncoil
  • Leakproof with rubber washer

Customize Garden Hose Male to Female

Connector could be re-installed.

The hose can be cut to any length as you want.

If the hose may kink or leak, you could cut the defective part, and re-install the connector. Got a brand new hose.

Adapted the hybrid polymer material, makes the hose more lightweight, and flexible.

No kinks of the hose. Fulfill all your garden watering.

*6ft/15ft for leader hose

*25/50ft for watering plants and flowers

*75ft/100ft for cleaning roof and backyard

Read more

SOLID FITTING (Male & Female Ends)

  • Brass plating aluminum material, effectively prevent corrosion or wear, for a longer service life
  • 3/4″ large diameter connection for full and unobstructed water flow
  • Clear and standard threads, female end with washer to eliminate water leakage troubles

Read more

TESTED TOUGH

Its super strong flexible hybrid polymer material is abrasion-resistant. This hose has been tested rigorously to confirm burst strength and Durable. Giraffe hose owns longer life.
